comments.comments_text: The corner from Trent Alexander-Arnold (Liverpool) is hurriedly cleared.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is hurriedly cleared.

comments.comments_text: This is definitely not what Grant Hanley (Norwich) wanted. Attempting to intercept an offensive pass, he scored an own goal and made it 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Roberto Firmino finds Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) with a sweet pass inside the penalty box, who then smashes the ball inside the left post. What a clinical finish to make it 2:0.

comments.comments_text: Mohamed Salah takes over corner duties and expertly finds Virgil van Dijk (Liverpool), who jumps highest and coolly plants a bullet header into the middle of the goal. The score is now 3:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] takes over corner duties and expertly finds [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), who jumps highest and coolly plants a bullet header into the middle of the goal. The score is now 3:0.

comments.comments_text: Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) picks up a pass on the edge of the box and manages to get a powerful shot away, forcing the goalkeeper to scramble to his left and palm the ball away. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Liverpool.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Divock Origi (Liverpool) makes it 4:0. He jumped highest to connect with a perfect cross from Trent Alexander-Arnold and planted his close-range header into the middle of the goal. Tim Krul was helpless.
